owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the camera direction of the viewpoint.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: camera direction

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the camera up vector.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: camera up vector

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the camera viewpoint direction.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: camera view point

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Explicit property to relate a topic to an specific part of the BIM Model.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has bim snippet

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a viewpoint with a bitmap element.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has bitmap

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a viewpoint with the camera being used.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has camera

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a viewpoint with a clipping plane used to define a subsection in the building model.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has clipping plane

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic with a comment.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has comment

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Related a viewpoint with the building elements it is conformed.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has component

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates a direction given by a 3D world coordinate.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has direction

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a topic to extra document references, such as additional payloads, or links.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has document reference

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link a topic with internal or external files such as BIM models, videos, images, text, etc.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has file

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Connects a viewpoint with a line being used to add markups in 3D.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has line

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the location of the bitmap, specifically the center of the bitmap in 3D world coordinates.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has location

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates to an specific point in 3D world coordinates.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has point

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: External references that help complemente the topic in discussion.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has reference link

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic with its stage.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has stage

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic with its label.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has topic label

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic with its status.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has topic status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic with its type.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has topic type

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a comment with a viewpoint.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has viewpoint

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the normal direction of the bitmap.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: normal vector

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic to a building.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to building

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a viewpoint to a comment over a topic.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to comment

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic to an element.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to element

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic to a project.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to project

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic to a space.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to space

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic to a storey.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to storey

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic to another topic.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to topic

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a topic to a zone.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: related to zone

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the up direction of the bitmap.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: up vector

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The user to whom this topic is assigned to. Recommended to be in email format.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: assigned to

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Large description of the comment.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: comment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the creator of the entity.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: creation author

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the creation date of the entity.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: creation date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Provides a description of the topic.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date until when the topics issue needs to be resolved.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: due date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Camera’s field of view angle in degrees.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: field of view

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Attribute to uniquely identify the topics, comments and viewpoints.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: identifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number to maintain the order of the topics.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: index

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates who modified the entity.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: modified author

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the last time the entity was modified.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: modified date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Topic priority.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: priority

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Filename of the snapshot taken under a viewpoint.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: snapshot name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the renovation project task.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: task id

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Title of the topic.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: title

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Scaling from view to world.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: view to world scale

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the viewpoint.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: viewpoint name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: X component of a 3D coordinate.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: x coordinate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Y component of a 3D coordinate.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: y coordinate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Z component of a 3D coordinate.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: z coordinate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A list of bitmaps can be used to add more information, for example, text in the visualization.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bitmap

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents the type of camera being used in the viewpoint.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Camera

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clipping Planes can be used to define a subsection of a building model that is related to the topic. Each clipping plane is defined by Location and Direction.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Clipping Plane

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Their purpose is to record discussion between different parties related to the topic.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Comment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents a coordinate in 3 dimensions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Coordinate3 D

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Lines can be used to add markup in 3D. Each line is defined by three dimensional Start Point and End Point. Lines that have the same start and end points are to be considered points and may be displayed accordingly.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Line

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents an orthogonal camera being used in the viewpoint.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Orthogonal Camera

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents an perspective camera being used in the viewpoint.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Perspective Camera

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Stage of the topic such as Planning, Construction, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stage

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Topic contains reference information of the topic.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topic

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Label of the topic, such as Electrical, Architecture, Structural, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topic Label

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Status of the topic such as Open, In Progress, Closed, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topic Status

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Type of the topic such as Comment, Issue, Request, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topic Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The viewpoint from which the BIM model is being viewed in the modeling tool.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Viewpoint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: See definition in http://bimerr.iot.linkeddata.es/def/building#Apartment
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Apartment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: See definition in http://bimerr.iot.linkeddata.es/def/building#Building
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Building

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: See definition in http://bimerr.iot.linkeddata.es/def/building#Element
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Element

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: See definition in http://bimerr.iot.linkeddata.es/def/building#Space
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Space

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: See definition in http://bimerr.iot.linkeddata.es/def/building#Storey
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Storey

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: See definition in: http://bimerr.iot.linkeddata.es/def/key-performance-indicator#Project
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Project
